decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - This permission shall have the effect of varying condition numbered 2 on planning permission reference P/0611/18 (dated 24/04/2018):

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out, completed and retained in accordance with the following approved plans:

2022-11BR-CON3-1 rev 1/0; Planning Statement
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning

Condition : 2 - This permission shall have the effect of varying condition numbered 3 on planning permission reference P/0611/18 (dated 24/04/2018):

The landscaping details hereby approved are to be retained and maintained in accordance with the approved plans. No increase in hardstanding on site shall be carried out without written approval from the Local Planning Authority. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance and character of the area, and to enhance the appearance of the development and to ensure that the cycle storage is sheltered and secure in accordance with policies 6.9 and 6.13 of The London Plan (2021) and policies DM22 and DM42 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013)

Condition : 3 - This permission shall have the effect of varying condition numbered 5 on planning permission reference P/0611/18 (dated 24/04/2018):

The refuse and recycling bins shall be stored at all times, other than on collection days, within the rear garden of each property. 

Reason: To ensure that the development would not adversely affect safety on the transport network, and to ensure a high standard of residential quality in accordance with Policy DM 45 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013)
description: Variation of condition 3 (landscaping) attached to planning permission P/0611/18 dated 24/04/2018 to reflect on items implemented on site
